title: Power of Magic
description: The battle is on.There's good news and bad news. The good news is I'm still alive. The bad news is that three deadly titans want to destroy the world, and they're more powerful than ever. Oh, and I have to stop them. I get my chance when they demand I fight them in their stronghold. Too bad I have no clue how to defeat them. When I consult a seer, I get my apparently, my only hope is to transform into my final Dragon God form. That's not as easy as it sounds. I must go on a deadly adventure that could kill me before the Titans ever get a chance. If I somehow manage to succeed, I will become more. So much more. And then itâ€™s time to kick some Titan butt.Power of Magic full of non-stop action, adventure, magic, and romance.
author: Linsey Hall
